article_title: What happens in Vegas . . . Trump has plans with Hannity
article_text:
Sean Hannity will interview Donald Trump for a full hour in Las Vegas Monday night.

On the eve of the Nevada GOP caucuses, Trump will assess his chances for the nomination and his position as top dog after a major victory in South Carolina, according to FoxNews.com.

The front-runner made the rounds on Sunday’s talk shows after a rough week of negative press over statements on the Obamacare mandate, the Bush war in Iraq and Planned Parenthood.

If you are not Trumped-out, you can catch the interview on Fox News Channel at 10 PM ET.

article_summary:
Sean Hannity will interview Donald Trump for a full hour in Las Vegas Monday night.
If you are not Trumped-out, you can catch the interview on Fox News Channel at 10 PM ET.
The front-runner made the rounds on Sunday’s talk shows after a rough week of negative press over statements on the Obamacare mandate, the Bush war in Iraq and Planned Parenthood.
On the eve of the Nevada GOP caucuses, Trump will assess his chances for the nomination and his position as top dog after a major victory in South Carolina, according to FoxNews.com.
